about: I am a seasoned full-stack software engineer with over 8 years of professional experience, specializing in backend development. My expertise lies in crafting robust and scalable SaaS-based architectures on the Amazon AWS platform.

project.name: Project 1
project.description: This is the description of the project. This project is about building a website for a client. The website is built using React and Node.js. The website is hosted on AWS.
